sentences.en: ...a dog that choked to death on its tether.
A five - foot tether reaches round both wheels of the bike.
sentences.cn: 一根五英尺长的索链将自行车的两只轮子扣住了.

sentences.en: Everyone is at the end of their tether with their appalling behaviour.
sentences.cn: 对于他们的卑劣行为,大家已忍无可忍.

sentences.en: He's at the end of his tether.
I was now at the end of my tether.
I'm at the end of my tether.
I'm at the end of my tether. I shall go mad if this goes on.
sentences.cn: 我已经走投无路. 再这么下去,我会发疯的.

sentences.en: I'm nearly at the end of my tether.
sentences.cn: 我已经到了山穷水尽的边缘.

sentences.en: I've reached the end of my tether.
It'seems that i am at the end of my tether.
sentences.cn: 看起来我已经无路可走了.

sentences.en: Look at this, like, wow . I must have really snapped the tether.
sentences.cn: 看这个, 就像, 哇我脱离了束缚,对吧?

sentences.en: She was jealous, humiliated, and emotionally at the end of her tether.
sentences.cn: 她既忌妒又感到屈辱，感情上已经到了崩溃的边缘。

sentences.en: The cow had broken her tether and was in the cornfield.
sentences.cn: 那牛弄断了系绳,跑到玉米田里去了.

sentences.en: The cow had broken its tether and was cornfield.
sentences.cn: 那头牛弄断系绳跑到玉米田里去了.

sentences.en: The cow had broken its tether and was in the cornfield.
sentences.cn: 那头牛弄断系绳,跑到玉米田里去了.

sentences.en: We should tether our plan to our resources.
sentences.cn: 我们应把我们的计划限定在自己财力所允许的范围内。

trans.tran_en: a rope or chain that an animal is tied to so that it can only move around within a limited area
to tie an animal to a post so that it can only move around within a limited area
